# scrollMode

**Instance Property**

Defines the axes in which the layer may be scrolled.

## Declaration

```swift
var scrollMode: CAScrollLayerScrollMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are described in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/scroll-modes]. The default is [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAScrollLayerScrollMode/both].
